original_text: One day, Jesus got into a boat with his disciples. He said to them, ‘We should go across to the other side of the lake.’ So they started to cross the lake.

sentences.original_text: One day, Jesus got into a boat with his disciples.
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 예수님께서 제자들과 함께 배에 타셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: We should go across to the other side of the lake.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 호수의 다른 편으로 건너가야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: So they started to cross the lake.
